basic.description: A contemporary and comprehensive assessment of the neurochemical features of the mammalian nervous system as they relate to development, function and disease. Winter term; 3 hour lecture/seminar. Offered alternate years. M.D. Kawaja.  PREREQUISITE: ANAT-312* or LISC-322* or permission of the Department.  EXCLUSION: ANAT-818*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Chemical Neuroanatomy
